title: Increase splash/intro overlay duration to 2 seconds (no other changes)

requirements.text: Update the intro/splash overlay so it remains on screen for ~2 seconds total before completing and dismissing, without changing any other app behavior or features.

quotes: Refine it's duration a bit further to 2 sec . Μην αλλάξεις τίποτα άλλο στην εφαρμογή και στις λειτουργίες της απλά κάνε το splash να κρατάει λίγο παραπάνω πριν εμφανιστεί η κεντρική σελίδα της εφαρμογής .

acceptanceCriteria: When the intro/splash overlay is shown, it takes approximately 2000ms from mount until it calls onComplete and is removed.
The fade/transition timing is consistent with the 2-second duration (no premature completion).
No other UI flows, authentication behavior, navigation, or data functionality changes.

constraints: Do not modify backend code or data/state schemas.
Do not change any app functionality besides the splash/intro overlay timing.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Redesigning the splash screen visuals or changing its content.
Changing when the splash triggers (e.g., login/return behavior).
Blocking user interaction during the splash (keep existing interaction behavior unchanged unless already blocking).
